name: Seldom Tools
body:
## Welcome to Seldom Tools.
I am dedicated to the creation of game development tools. After working for ten years as AI and gameplay programmer on multiple game projects, I found myself preferring tool work more and more. Thanks to Unity's openness I am now able to make tools for a wide audience of professional and aspiring developers.

### RelationsInspector
You it what kinds of relations you are interested in and give it an object to inspect. The RelationsInspector then generates a graph and presents it to you.
 * Get it on the Asset Store (currently being reviewed)
 * [Try the demo](http://forum.unity3d.com/threads/demo-relations-inspector-asset.295319/)
 * [Customize it](https://github.com/seldomU/RIBackendUtil)

### FunkyBlocks
The learning curve of [Scratch](https://scratch.mit.edu/)'s block based programming combined with Unity's feature set. Coming soon...
